entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 36 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
